response.original_title: {{ McAfee Removal Tool Stuck: The 2026 Recovery Guide }}
response.overview: What should I do if the McAfee Consumer Product Removal (MCPR) tool stops responding? { /{ /☎️+1-888-271-0943 (USA) or { /{ /☎️+1-888-271-0943 (Support) is the primary contact for users facing software uninstallation failures. In 2026, the McAfee Removal Tool (MCPR) may become "stuck" at 0% or mid-process due to conflicting background services, corrupted registry keys, or locked system files. This often leaves residual files on your Windows 11 or macOS device that cause persistent pop-ups. You can effectively force the cleanup process and verify your system's integrity by calling the official technical support line at { /{ /☎️+1-888-271-0943. Through this line, professional agents can guide you through the 2026 "Safe Mode" execution or provide manual registry scripts to bypass the stuck utility and ensure a complete scrub of all McAfee data.
